txt.en:
'Always you press forwards, [placeholder], eager to accept new challenges and face new evils; but there is value in remembering your past deeds. From them, you can learn much!

'Do you remember seeking the breastplate of Laerdan within the cave of Dolendath, in Imlad Balchorth? The refuge of Golodir's army had since become a place of great evil, and your search there was fraught with danger.

'Peer into the Reflecting Pool and experience this memory anew, [placeholder]. You will find that recalling your past may do you much good in the present.'
'I am pleased that you have revisited your experience recovering the breatplate of Laerdan, [placeholder]. Only through study of our past deeds can we gain knowledge that will aid us in the future.'
'Look into the Reflecting Pool and meditate upon your past deeds....'
I.14.1 Tale: The Heraldry of Lindon
A Sage of Eriador has invited you to recollect your experience seeking the breastplate of Laerdan within the cave of Dolendath.
Peer into the Reflecting Pool and revisit 'The Heraldry of Lindon'

The Reflecting Pool in Aughaire will allow you to revisit 'The Heraldry of Lindon.'\n\nA Sage of Eriador has challenged you to revisit your experience seeking the breastplate of Laerdan within Dolendath by using the Reflecting Pool in Aughaire.

A Sage of Eriador is by the Reflecting Pool in Aughaire.\n\nA Sage of Eriador in Aughaire is waiting to discuss what you have learned from revisiting your experience seeking the breastplate of Laerdan within Dolendath.
